section.name: javascript Namespace
section.p: This namespace provides commands to serve JavaScript via a servlet container.

section.name: Available Commands
section.subsection:
Attributes
NameDescriptionTypeDefault ValueJava Return Type
responseorg.xchain.annotations.AttributeType.JXPATH_VALUE$servlet:responseHttpServletResponse
manifestorg.xchain.annotations.AttributeType.JXPATH_VALUEN/AString
compressorg.xchain.annotations.AttributeType.JXPATH_VALUE\false\Boolean
optimization-levelorg.xchain.annotations.AttributeType.JXPATH_VALUE0Integer
debugorg.xchain.annotations.AttributeType.JXPATH_VALUE\false\Boolean
A basic javascript merging command. Will cache results for a merge of the compression flag is set.
